TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed PartitionOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Indicates the context in which to run the COM+ partition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For information on partitions, see "COM+ Partitions" in the COM+ (Component Services) section in the Platform SDK documentation in the MSDN Library.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.PartitionOption Ignore = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The enclosed context runs in the Global Partition. Ignore is the default setting for <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.PartitionOption%2A> when <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance%2A> is set to .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.PartitionOption Inherit = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The enclosed context runs in the current containing COM+ partition. This is the default setting for <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.PartitionOption%2A> when <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ServiceConfig.Inheritance%2A> is set to .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.PartitionOption New = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The enclosed context runs in a COM+ partition that is different from the current containing partition.
